contentrichtext.text: '''Yura''' may refer to: ;Place * [[Yura, Wakayama]], a town in [[Japan]] * [[Yura District]], a district in [[Peru]] * [[Yura Station]], a railway station in Japan ;People * [[Yura Hinata]], a Japanese voice actress * ''Yura Kim'', an alternate name of [[Kim Jong-il]], the leader of [[North Korea]] * [[Yura Movsisyan]], an Armenian [[soccer]] player ;Fictional characters * [[Yura Sakuratsuki]], from the anime series [[Futakoi]] ;Other * [[Japanese cruiser Yura]], a cruiser of the [[Imperial Japanese Navy]] * JDS ''Yura'', a Japanese Maritime Self-Defense Force ship<!-- Note: participating in disaster relief after the [[2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami]]; ''see'' Seawaves, [http://www.seawaves.com/japan2011.asp "Warships Supporting Earthquake in Japan"] --> * [[Yura languages]], a language group of [[Australian Aboriginal languages]] * [[Yura Asaf]], a religious figure of multiple religions. See [[Yuz Asaf]] * [[Diminutive form]] for Russian given name [[Yury]] {{Disambig}}
